prepared_by: Ramirez Structural Inc. — Jose Ramirez, PE
description: First structural notes sheet containing City of Long Beach Form G01 (Structural Observation Designation), special inspection requirements, special inspection required items (anchors, wood shear walls, nailing), structural steel specifications (ASTM A992, A36, A325), structural abbreviations table, and declaration/acknowledgment statement. Red 'APPROVED' stamp present (Anthony Montez, Building Plan Check).
key_content: Form G01: Structural Observation Designation per CBC Section 1704.6 — City of Long Beach
Structural observation required for lateral force-resisting system per CBC 1704.6 and LBMC 18.04
Special inspection per 2022 CBC Section 1705
Special inspection required: anchor bolts, epoxied dowels in concrete at (P)olding/(E)xisting footings/(C)oncrete slabs
Special inspection required: inside and sleeve anchors (where noted)
Special inspection required: wood shear walls, shear panels, diaphragms — nailing, framing, boundary elements, holdowns, drag struts
Special inspection by deputy inspector required where fastener spacing is 4" O.C. or less (nailing permit required)
Structural steel: wide flange per ASTM A992, other shapes and bars per ASTM A36
Structural bolts: ASTM A325 bearing type connections
High strength connectors: ASTM A325, nuts per ASTM A563
Bolt holes: 1/16" larger than bolt unless noted otherwise
Non-shrink grout: minimum 5,000 PSI compressive strength at 28 days (Quikrete 1585 or equivalent)
All steel exposed to weather: hot-dip galvanized per ASTM A153/A123
All structural steel: shop primed with approved rust inhibitive primer
Full penetration groove welds for moment frame members: special inspection required
Fabrication in approved shop only; shop drawings submitted to engineer before fabrication
Structural abbreviations table provided (DFL, O.C., PSI, PSF, GWB, CMU, STR, PT, GALV, etc.)
Declaration date: 10/29/2025
Project No.: 26-357
NOT SHOWN: seismic design values (Ss, S1, SDS, SD1, Seismic Design Category) — may be on subsequent structural notes page
NOT SHOWN: wind speed and exposure category
NOT SHOWN: concrete specs (PSI, cement type, W/C ratio)
NOT SHOWN: rebar specs (ASTM grade, cover dimensions)
NOT SHOWN: nailing schedule
NOT SHOWN: lumber species and grade specification
NOT SHOWN: special inspection list for concrete or soil
NOT SHOWN: adhesive anchor specs (ASTM standards, cure time)
NOT SHOWN: pressure-treated wood requirements
NOT SHOWN: engineered wood product specs (manufacturer, ICC-ES report numbers)

drawing_zones.content: Form G01 — Structural Observation Designation: City of Long Beach Community Development Department form per CBC 1704.6, structural observation requirements for lateral force-resisting system, code references (CBC 2022, LBMC)
Declaration and Acknowledgment Statement: owner declaration, registered design professional declaration, date signed 10/29/2025, address 326 Flint Ave Long Beach CA 90814
Special Inspection: 8 numbered requirements per 2022 CBC Section 1705 — inspector qualifications, reporting requirements, on-site presence, certification by building department

Special Inspection Required: 5 items — anchor bolts and dowels, epoxied dowels at existing/new footings/slabs, inside and sleeve anchors, wood shear walls/panels/diaphragms/holdowns/drag struts, deputy inspector for 4" O.C. fastener spacing (nailing permit required)

Structural Steel: 14 numbered notes — ASTM A992 (wide flange), A36 (shapes/bars), A325 (bolts), A563 (nuts), bolt holes 1/16" oversize, non-shrink grout 5,000 PSI at 28 days, hot-dip galvanized per A153/A123, shop primed, groove welds inspection, approved fabricator
Structural Abbreviations table: comprehensive list of abbreviations used on structural drawings (DFL, O.C., PSI, PSF, GWB, CMU, STR, PT, GALV, FTG, FDN, HDR, etc.)
Red APPROVED stamp — Anthony Montez, Building Plan Check

Title block (rotated vertical): RAMIREZ STRUCTURAL INC., Jose Ramirez PE, (562) 519-8045, NEW ADU ABOVE (E) GARAGE, 326 FLINT AVE, LONG BEACH CA 90814, Project No. 26-357, Date 10/29/25, Sheet S1.1 STRUCTURAL NOTES
